Compatible with iOS 9, 10 and 11

Is your camera roll a mess? Do you hate using the photos app? Take back control of your photos with PhotoManager.

Features:
- Choose to move or copy photos out of the camera roll into albums
- Protect albums with Touch ID or password (activated by long press or in edit menu)
- Hide protected albums from other apps
- Save photos directly to an album from the camera
- Hide/show locked albums with a quick gesture
- Individually hide stock albums including recently deleted
- Change the number of grid columns
- Customise the tab bar

Notes:
- PhotoManager does not modify any system files and will not apply in non-jailbroken mode.
- It utilises Apple's inbuilt hidden photos folder. It is recommend to unhide any photos before installing this tweak
- Syncing will move all album photos out of the camera roll. You can toggle which albums this affects in settings

Options configurable in settings.

- iOS 11 support (Requires Rocketbootstrap) - Added ability to hide individual folders in apps (including photos app) - Added feature to automatically return to main album list if exiting photos app whilst in a locked album - Added haptic feedback for locking albums on supported devices - Added option to save image directly to an album from share sheet - Reorganised the preferences pane - Fixed multiple UI and functional bugs - Removed custom columns (due to incompatability across devices) 1.1.1
- Fixed inability to turn off camera album picker
- Fixed camera album picker remembering an album when it shouldn't
- Fixed tab bar intermittently reappearing if only one tab showing
- Fixed toggling stock albums in WhatsApp


1.1.0 changes
- Initial iOS 9 support (custom columns not supported)
- Removed loophole for moving locked album photos back into camera roll without authorisation
- Added options to increase maximum zoom and show live photo indicators
- Fixed camera roll thumbnail showing photos that were moved out of camera roll


1.0.3
- Fix screenshots not showing in other apps
- Option to allow reordering of stock albums


1.0.2 fixes
- Fixed bug with cropping or rotating photos
- Fixed albums not showing in some apps such as Dropbox and OneDrive
- Attempt to fix layout issues
- Added option to disable custom column layouts
- Fixed photos not moving properly between custom albums
